주문 목록 I

An Mor Fappearing at the end of a spell’s name in the spell lists denotes a spell with a material or focus component, respectively, that is not normally included in a spell component pouch. An Xdenotes a spell with an XP component paid by the caster.

제시 순서: In the spell lists and the spell descriptions that follow them, the spells are presented in alphabetical order by name except for those belonging to certain spell chains.

When a spell’s name begins with “lesser,” “greater,” or “mass,” the spell description is alphabetized under the second word of the spell name instead.

히트 다이스: The term “Hit Dice” is used synonymously with “character levels” for effects that affect a number of Hit Dice of creatures. Creatures with Hit Dice only from their race, not from classes, have character levels equal to their Hit Dice.

시전자 레벨: A spell’s power often depends on caster level, which is defined as the caster’s class level for the purpose of casting a particular spell. A creature with no classes has a caster level equal to its Hit Dice unless otherwise specified. The word “level” in the spell lists that follow always refers to caster level.

생명체 및 캐릭터: The words “creature” and “character” are used synonymously in the spell descriptions.

음유시인 주문

0 레벨 음유시인 주문 (소마법)

  • 춤추는 빛: Creates torches or other lights.
  • 강타: Humanoid creature of 4 HD or less loses next action.
  • 마법 감지: Detects spells and magic items within 60 ft.
  • 섬광: Dazzles one creature (–1 on attack rolls).
  • 유령의 소리: Figment sounds.
  • 방향 알아내기: You discern north.
  • 빛: Object shines like a torch.
  • 자장가: Makes subject drowsy; –5 on Spot and Listen checks, –2 on Will saves against sleep.
  • 마법사의 손: 5-pound telekinesis.
  • 수선: Makes minor repairs on an object.
  • 통보: Whispered conversation at distance.
  • 열기/닫기: Opens or closes small or light things.
  • 요술: Performs minor tricks.
  • 마법 읽기: Read scrolls and spellbooks.
  • 저항: Subject gains +1 on saving throws.
  • 악기 소환: Summons one instrument of the caster’s choice.

1 레벨 음유시인 주문

  • 알람: Wards an area for 2 hours/level.
  • 살아 움직이는 밧줄: Makes a rope move at your command.
  • 공포 유발: One creature of 5 HD or less flees for 1d4 rounds.
  • 인간형 매혹: Makes one person your friend.
  • 언어 이해: You understand all spoken and written languages.
  • 가벼운 상처 치유: Cures 1d8 damage +1/level (max +5).
  • 비밀문 감지: Reveals hidden doors within 60 ft.
  • 변장: Changes your appearance.
  • 삭제: Mundane or magical writing vanishes.
  • 날쌘 퇴각: Your speed increases by 30 ft.
  • 깃털 낙하: Objects or creatures fall slowly.
  • 기름칠: Makes 10-ft. square or one object slippery.
  • 끔찍한 웃음: Subject loses actions for 1 round/ level.
  • 최면술: Fascinates 2d4 HD of creatures.
  • 식별 M: Determines properties of magic item.
  • 하급 혼란: One creature is confused for 1 round.
  • 마법의 입 M: Speaks once when triggered.
  • 마법 오라: Alters object’s magic aura.
  • 물체 숨기기: Masks object against scrying.
  • 공포 제거: Suppresses fear or gives +4 on saves against fear for one subject + one per four levels.
  • 침묵의 환영: Creates minor illusion of your design.
  • 수면: Puts 4 HD of creatures into magical slumber.
  • 몬스터 I 소환: Calls extraplanar creature to fight for you.
  • 성향 탐지 방어: Conceals alignment for 24 hours.
  • 보이지 않는 하인: Invisible force obeys your commands.
  • 복화술: Throws voice for 1 min./level.

2 레벨 음유시인 주문

  • 형체 번형: Assume form of a similar creature.
  • 동물 사자: Sends a Tiny animal to a specific place.
  • 동물 최면: Fascinates 2d6 HD of animals.
  • 실명/실청: Makes subject blind or deaf.
  • 흐릿함: Attacks miss subject 20% of the time.
  • 평온한 감정: Calms creatures, negating emotion effects.
  • 고양이의 우아함: Subject gains +4 to Dex for 1 min./level.
  • 일반적인 상처 치유: Cures 2d8 damage +1/level (max +10).
  • 암흑: 20-ft. radius of supernatural shadow.
  • 몬스터 강타: Living creature of 6 HD or less loses next action.
  • 중독 지연: Stops poison from harming subject for 1 hour/ level.
  • 생각 감지: Allows “listening” to surface thoughts.
  • 독수리의 광휘: Subject gains +4 to Cha for 1 min./level.
  • 속박: Captivates all within 100 ft. + 10 ft./level.
  • 여우의 교활함: Subject gains +4 to Int for 1 min./level.
  • 반짝이가루: Blinds creatures, outlines invisible creatures.
  • 영웅심: Gives +2 on attack rolls, saves, skill checks.
  • 인간형 포박: Paralyzes one humanoid for 1 round/level.
  • 최면의 무늬: Fascinates (2d4 + level) HD of creatures.
  • 투명화: Subject is invisible for 1 min./level or until it attacks.
  • 물체 위치파악: Senses direction toward object (specific or type).
  • 하급 환영: As silent image, plus some sound.
  • 환영 복제: Creates decoy duplicates of you (1d4 +1 per three levels, max 8).
  • 눈속임: Misleads divinations for one creature or object.
  • 화염술: Turns fire into blinding light or choking smoke.
  • 격노: Gives +2 to Str and Con, +1 on Will saves, –2 to AC.
  • 겁주기: Panics creatures of less than 6 HD.
  • 분쇄: Sonic vibration damages objects or crystalline creatures.
  • 침묵: Negates sound in 20-ft. radius.
  • 소리 폭발: Deals 1d8 sonic damage to subjects; may stun them.
  • 제안: Compels subject to follow stated course of action.
  • 몬스터 II 소환: Calls extraplanar creature to fight for you.
  • 무리 소환: Summons swarm of bats, rats, or spiders.
  • 통역마법: Speak any language.
  • 바람의 속삭임: Sends a short message 1 mile/level.

3 레벨 음유시인 주문

  • 깜빡임: You randomly vanish and reappear for 1 round/level.
  • 몬스터 매혹: Makes monster believe it is your ally.
  • 투청/투시: Hear or see at a distance for 1 min./level.
  • 혼란: Subjects behave oddly for 1 round/level.
  • 짓누르는 절망: Subjects take –2 on attack rolls, damage rolls, saves, and checks.
  • 심각한 상처 치유: Cures 3d8 damage +1/level (max +15).
  • 햇살: 60-ft. radius of bright light.
  • 깊은 잠: Puts 10 HD of creatures to sleep.
  • 마법 무효화: Cancels magical spells and effects.
  • 변위: Attacks miss subject 50%.
  • 공포: Subjects within cone flee for 1 round/level.
  • 기체 형태: Subject becomes insubstantial and can fly slowly.
  • 기아스, 하급: Commands subject of 7 HD or less.
  • 입심: You gain +30 bonus on Bluff checks, and your lies can escape magical discernment.
  • 희망: Subjects gain +2 on attack rolls, damage rolls, saves, and checks.
  • 가속: One creature/level moves faster, +1 on attack rolls, AC, and Reflex saves.
  • 환영 문서 M: Only intended reader can decipher.
  • 투명의 구:Makes everyone within 10 ft. invisible.
  • 상급 환영: As silent image, plus sound, smell and thermal effects.
  • 환상의 군마: Magic horse appears for 1 hour/level.
  • 저주 제거: Frees object or person from curse.
  • 염탐 F: Spies on subject from a distance.
  • 소리 조각하기: Creates new sounds or changes existing ones.
  • 비밀 페이지: Changes one page to hide its real content.
  • 투명상태 보기: Reveals invisible creatures or objects.
  • 먹빛 뱀의 인장 M: Creates text symbol that immobilizes reader.
  • 감속화: One subject/level takes only one action/round, –1 to AC, reflex saves, and attack rolls.
  • 동물과 대화: You can communicate with animals.
  • 몬스터 III 소환: Calls extraplanar creature to fight for you.
  • 조그마한 오두막: Creates shelter for ten creatures.

4 레벨 음유시인 주문

  • 부여술 파괴: Frees subjects from enchantments, alterations, curses, and petrification.
  • 치명적인 상처 치유: Cures 4d8 damage +1/level (max +20).
  • 염탐 감지: Alerts you of magical eavesdropping.
  • 차원의 문: Teleports you short distance.
  • 인간형 지배: Controls humanoid telepathically.
  • 이동의 자유: Subject moves normally despite impediments.
  • 환영의 지형: Makes one type of terrain appear like another (field into forest, or the like).
  • 몬스터 포박: As hold person, but any creature.
  • 투명화, 상급: As invisibility, but subject can attack and stay invisible.
  • 전설의 지식 MF: Lets you learn tales about a person, place, or thing.
  • 생명체 위치파악: Indicates direction to familiar creature.
  • 기억 조작: Changes 5 minutes of subject’s memories.
  • 독성 무효화: Immunizes subject against poison, detoxifies venom in or on subject.
  • 무지개 무늬: Lights fascinate 24 HD of creatures.
  • 무리 퇴치: Insects, spiders, and other vermin stay 10 ft. away.
  • 안전 가옥: Creates sturdy cottage.
  • 어둠 소환술: Mimics conjuring below 4th level, but only 20% real.
  • 힘찬 함성: Deafens all within cone and deals 5d6 sonic damage.
  • 식물과 대화: You can talk to normal plants and plant creatures.
  • 몬스터 IV 소환: Calls extraplanar creature to fight for you.
  • 침묵의 영역: Keeps eavesdroppers from overhearing conversations.

5 레벨 음유시인 주문

  • 가벼운 상처 치유, 광역: Cures 1d8 damage +1/level for many creatures.
  • 마법 무효화, 상급: As dispel magic, but +20 on check.
  • 꿈꾸기: Sends message to anyone sleeping.
  • 거짓 광경 M: Fools scrying with an illusion.
  • 영웅심, 상급: Gives +4 bonus on attack rolls, saves, skill checks; immunity to fear; temporary hp.
  • 정신 안개: Subjects in fog get –10 to Wis and Will checks.
  • 신기루 비전술: As hallucinatory terrain, plus structures.
  • 오도: Turns you invisible and creates illusory double.
  • 밤마귀: Sends vision dealing 1d10 damage, fatigue.
  • 지속적인 환영: As major image, but no concentration required.
  • 외관변경: Changes appearance of one person per two levels.
  • 어둠 강신술: Mimics evocation of lower than 5th level, but only 20% real.
  • 어둠 보행: Step into shadow to travel rapidly.
  • 불화의 노래: Forces targets to attack each other.
  • 제안, 광역: As suggestion, plus one subject/level.
  • 몬스터 V 소환: Calls extraplanar creature to fight for you.

6 레벨 음유시인 주문

  • 드웨머 분석 F: Reveals magical aspects of subject.
  • 살아 움직이는 물체: Objects attack your foes.
  • 고양이의 우아함, 광역: As cat’s grace, affects one subject/level.
  • 몬스터 매혹, 광역: As charm monster, but all within 30 ft.
  • 일반적인 상처 치유, 광역: Cures 2d8 damage +1/level for many creatures.
  • 독수리의 광휘, 광역: As eagle’s splendor, affects one subject/level.
  • 눈동자물기: Target becomes panicked, sickened, and comatose.
  • 길 찾기: Shows most direct way to a location.
  • 여우의 교활함, 광역: As fox’s cunning, affects one subject/level.
  • 기아스/임무: As lesser geas, plus it affects any creature.
  • 영웅의 잔치: Food for one creature/level cures and grants combat bonuses.
  • 춤의 유혹: Forces subject to dance.
  • 영구적인 환영: Includes sight, sound, and smell.
  • 조건적으로 발동하는 환영 M: As major image, plus triggered by event.
  • 환영 투사: Illusory double can talk and cast spells.
  • 염탐, 상급: As scrying, but faster and longer.
  • 힘찬 함성, 상급: Devastating yell deals 10d6 sonic damage; stuns creatures, damages objects.
  • 몬스터 VI 소환: Calls extraplanar creature to fight for you.
  • 공감의 떨림: Deals 2d10 damage/round to freestanding structure.
  • 가리개: Changes appearance of group of creatures.

사제 주문

0 레벨 사제 주문 (소마법)

  • 물 생성: Creates 2 gallons/level of pure water.
  • 사소한 상처 치유: Cures 1 point of damage.
  • 마법 감지: Detects spells and magic items within 60 ft.
  • 독 감지: Detects poison in one creature or object.
  • 길라잡이: +1 on one attack roll, saving throw, or skill check.
  • 사소한 상처 가하기: Touch attack, 1 point of damage.

  • 가벼운 상처 가하기: Touch deals 1d8 damage +1/level (max +5).

  • 마법 무기: Weapon gains +1 bonus.
  • 차폐의 안개: Fog surrounds you.

  • 성역: Opponents can’t attack you, and you can’t attack.

3 레벨 사제 주문

  2. 2 식별: Determines properties of magic item.
  3. 3 마법 무효화: Cancels magical spells and effects.
  4. 4 주문의 능력을 부여: Transfer spells to subject.
  5. 5 주문 저항: Subject gains SR 12 + level.
  6. 6 대마법 보호장: Negates magic within 10 ft.
  7. 7 주문 반사: Reflect 1d4+6 spell levels back at caster.
  8. 8 주문 방어 마법 MF: Confers +8 resistance bonus.
  9. 9 마법사의 분열: Dispels magic, disenchants magic items.

식물 계열

보장된 능력: Rebuke or command plant creatures as an evil cleric rebukes or commands undead. Use this ability a total number of times per day equal to 3 + your Charisma modifier. This granted power is a supernatural ability.

Add Knowledge (nature) to your list of cleric class skills.

식물 계열 주문
  1. 1 휘감기: Plants entangle everyone in 40-ft.-radius.
  2. 2 나무껍질피부: Grants +2 (or higher) enhancement to natural armor.
  3. 3 식물 성장: Grows vegetation, improves crops.
  4. 4 식물 명령: Sway the actions of one or more plant creatures.
  5. 5 가시 장벽: Thorns damage anyone who tries to pass.
  6. 6 나무 퇴치: Pushes away wooden objects.
  7. 7 살아 움직이는 식물: One or more trees animate and fight for you.
  8. 8 식물 조종: Control actions of one or more plant creatures.
  9. 9 휘청거리는 자: Summons 1d4+2 shambling mounds to fight for you.

보호 계열

보장된 능력: You can generate a protective ward as a supernatural ability. Grant someone you touch a resistance bonus equal to your cleric level on his or her next saving throw. Activating this power is a standard action. The protective ward is an abjuration effect with a duration of 1 hour that is usable once per day.

보호 계열 주문
  1. 1 성역: Opponents can’t attack you, and you can’t attack.
  2. 2 타인의 방패 F: You take half of subject’s damage.
  3. 3 에너지 방어 마법: Absorb 12 points/level of damage from one kind of energy.
  4. 4 주문 면역: Subject is immune to one spell per four levels.
  5. 5 주문 저항: Subject gains SR 12 + level.
  6. 6 대마법 보호장: Negates magic within 10 ft.
  7. 7 격퇴: Creatures can’t approach you.
  8. 8 정신 공백: Subject is immune to mental/emotional magic and scrying.
  9. 9 무지갯빛의 구: As prismatic wall, but surrounds on all sides.

근력 계열

보장된 능력: You can perform a feat of strength as a supernatural ability. You gain an enhancement bonus to Strength equal to your cleric level. Activating the power is a free action, the power lasts 1 round, and it is usable once per day.

근력 계열 주문
  1. 1 인간형 거대화: Humanoid creature doubles in size.
  2. 2 황소의 근력: Subject gains +4 to Str for 1 min./level.
  3. 3 마법의 예복: Armor or shield gains +1 enhancement per four levels.
  4. 4 주문 면역: Subject is immune to one spell per four levels.
  5. 5 의로운 권능: Your size increases, and you gain combat bonuses.
  6. 6 돌피부 M: Ignore 10 points of damage per attack.
  7. 7 붙잡는 손: Large hand provides cover, pushes, or grapples.
  8. 8 꽉 쥔 주먹: Large hand provides cover, pushes, or attacks your foes.
  9. 9 짓누르는 손: Large hand provides cover, pushes, or crushes your foes.

태양 계열

보장된 능력: Once per day, you can perform a greater turning against undead in place of a regular turning. The greater turning is like a normal turning except that the undead creatures that would be turned are destroyed instead.

태양 계열 주문
  1. 1 정령 견디기: Exist comfortably in hot or cold environments.
  2. 2 금속 가열: Make metal so hot it damages those who touch it.
  3. 3 타오르는 빛: Ray deals 1d8/two levels, more against undead.
  4. 4 화염 방패: Creatures attacking you take fire damage; you’re protected from heat or cold.
  5. 5 화염 타격: Smite foes with divine fire (1d6/level damage).
  6. 6 불꽃 씨앗: Acorns and berries become grenades and bombs.
  7. 7 태양광선: Beam blinds and deals 4d6 damage.
  8. 8 태양폭발: Blinds all within 10 ft., deals 6d6 damage.
  9. 9 무지갯빛의 구: As prismatic wall, but surrounds on all sides.

여행 계열

보장된 능력: For a total time per day of 1 round per cleric level you possess, you can act normally regardless of magical effects that impede movement as if you were affected by the spell freedom of movement. This effect occurs automatically as soon as it applies, lasts until it runs out or is no longer needed, and can operate multiple times per day (up to the total daily limit of rounds).

This granted power is a supernatural ability.

Add Survival to your list of cleric class skills.

여행 계열 주문
  1. 1 긴걸음주자: Increases your speed.
  2. 2 물체 위치파악: Senses direction toward object (specific or type).
  3. 3 비행: Subject flies at speed of 60 ft.
  4. 4 차원의 문: Teleports you short distance.
  5. 5 순간이동: Instantly transports you as far as 100 miles/level.
  6. 6 길 찾기: Shows most direct way to a location.
  7. 7 순간이동, 상급: As teleport, but no range limit and no off-target arrival.
  8. 8 위상의 문: Creates an invisible passage through wood or stone.
  9. 9 유체 이탈 M: Projects you and companions onto Astral Plane.

속임수 계열

보장된 능력: Add Bluff, Disguise, and Hide to your list of cleric class skills.

속임수 계열 주문
  1. 1 변장: Disguise own appearance.
  2. 2 투명화: Subject invisible 1 min./level or until it attacks.
  3. 3 탐지방어 M: Hides subject from divination, scrying.
  4. 4 혼란: Subjects behave oddly for 1 round/level.
  5. 5 거짓 광경 M: Fools scrying with an illusion.
  6. 6 오도: Turns you invisible and creates illusory double.
  7. 7 가림막: Illusion hides area from vision, scrying.
  8. 8 객체 변이: Changes any subject into anything else.
  9. 9 시간 정지: You act freely for 1d4+1 rounds.

전쟁 계열

보장된 능력: Free Martial Weapon Proficiency with deity’s favored weapon (if necessary) and Weapon Focus with the deity’s favored weapon.

전쟁 계열 주문
  1. 1 마법 무기: Weapon gains +1 bonus.
  2. 2 영혼의 무기: Magical weapon attacks on its own.
  3. 3 마법의 예복: Armor or shield gains +1 enhancement per four levels.
  4. 4 신의 권능: You gain attack bonus, +6 to Str, and 1 hp/level.
  5. 5 화염 타격: Smite foes with divine fire (1d6/level damage).
  6. 6 칼날 방벽: Wall of blades deals 1d6/level damage.
  7. 7 권능의 말씀 눈멃: Blinds creature with 200 hp or less.
  8. 8 권능의 말씀 기절: Stuns creature with 150 hp or less.
  9. 9 권능의 말씀 죽음: Kills creature with 100 hp or less.

물 계열

보장된 능력: Turn or destroy fire creatures as a good cleric turns undead. Rebuke, command, or bolster water creatures as an evil cleric rebukes undead. Use these abilities a total number of times per day equal to 3 + your Charisma modifier. This granted power is a supernatural ability.

물 계열 주문
  1. 1 차폐의 안개: Fog surrounds you.
  2. 2 안개 구름: Fog obscures vision.
  3. 3 수중 호흡: Subjects can breathe underwater.
  4. 4 물 조종: Raises or lowers bodies of water.
  5. 5 얼음 폭풍: Hail deals 5d6 damage in cylinder 40 ft. across.
  6. 6 냉기 돌풍: 1d6/level cold damage.
  7. 7 산성 안개: Fog deals acid damage.
  8. 8 지독한 고사: Deals 1d6/level damage within 30 ft.
  9. 9 정령 떼*: Summons multiple elementals.

*Cast as a water spell only.
